¡Bienvenido a RenovaMarket! Tu destino c: ¡Welcome to RenovaMarket! Your trusted destination to buy and sell a wide variety of second hand products.
Explora nuestro catálogo diverso y únete: Explore our diverse catalog and join a community of passionate buyers and sellers  ¡find yours today!
¡Dale una nueva vida a los objetos que y: ¡Give a new life to the objects you no longer use! At RenovaMarket, we believe in the value of reuse and we offer you a safe and easy-to-use platform
vender tus productos de segunda mano. Al: to sell your second-hand products. At the same time, you can discover hidden treasures that others have put up for sale - join us and be part of the circular economy!
¡Descubre nuestra variedad de productos: ¡Discover our variety of second-hand and new products!
En RenovaMarket, no solo encontrarás una: At RenovaMarket, you will not only find a wide range of second hand products, but also a selection of high quality new products.
Ya sea que estés buscando un libro raro,: Whether you're looking for a rare book, a vintage piece of furniture or a new tech gadget, you're sure to find it on our platform. ¡Browse and discover your next acquisitions!
¡Únete a nuestra comunidad y encuentra l: ¡Join our community and find what you need!
RenovaMarket es más que una plataforma d: RenovaMarket is more than a buying and selling platform, it is a community of people who value reuse and exchange. By joining us, you will not only have the opportunity
de comprar y vender, sino también de con: to buy and sell, but also to connect with other users, share your interests and contribute to a more sustainable consumption. ¡Join RenovaMarket and find exactly what you need!
Está seguro de eliminar este producto: Are you sure to remove this product
The product name must be text.
El nombre del producto debe tener al men: Product name must be at least 4 characters.
El nombre del producto no puede tener má: The product name cannot be longer than 30 characters.
El nombre del producto no puede comenzar: The product name cannot begin with a number.
La descripción del producto no puede ten: The product description may not be longer than 200 characters.
La descripción del producto debe ser un: “The product description must be a single character.
La descripción del producto no puede com: The product description cannot begin with a number.
The price of the product is mandatory.
El precio del producto debe ser un númer: The price of the product must be a number.
El precio del producto no puede ser nega: The price of the product cannot be negative.
El precio del producto no puede ser mayo: The price of the product cannot be greater than $9999.99.
El precio del producto debe tener máximo: The price of the product must have a maximum of two decimal places.
La categoría del producto debe ser un te: The product category must be a text.
The image of the product is mandatory.
The file must be an image.
El archivo debe ser una imagen de tipo J: The file must be an image of type JPEG, JPG or PNG.
El tamaño máximo permitido para la image: The maximum size allowed for the image is 2048 kilobytes.
El stock del producto debe ser un número: The product stock must be a whole number.
El stock del producto no puede ser negat: Product stock cannot be negative and must be at least 1.
El stock del producto no puede ser mayor: Product stock cannot be greater than 1000.
Está seguro de eliminar su cuenta?: Are you sure to delete your account?
